scripts.copy1: cp -r output/ ../learn-next/node_modules/react-package-nextjs/dist/ && cp package.json ../learn-next/node_modules/react-package-nextjs/ && cp -r output/styles.css ../learn-next/static/css/package.css && cp -r output/assets/ ../learn-next/static/assets/
scripts.doStuff: npm run clean && npm run dist && npm run compilelinaria && npm run copy
scripts.doStuff1: npm run clean && rollup -c && npm run copy1
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && webpack && rm -r ../learn-next/node_modules/react-package-nextjs && cp -r dist/ ../learn-next/node_modules/react-package-nextjs/ && cp package.json ../learn-next/node_modules/react-package-nextjs/
scripts.publish:npm: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && babel src -d dist --copy-files && rm -r ../learn-next/node_modules/react-package-nextjs && cp -r dist/ ../learn-next/node_modules/react-package-nextjs/
